full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-G DATE: 07/26/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 12051208 8:00-8:30 AM 816 811 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 413 413 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1237 1239 8:30- 9:00 AM 846 849 4:30-5:00 PM 460 459 1:00-1:30 AM 109 140 9:00-9:30 AM 913 914 5:00 -5:30 PM 510 513 1:30-2:00 AM 119 140 9:30-10:00 AM 938 939 5:30-6:00 PM 538 535 2:00-2:30 AM 207 209 10:00-10:30 AM 1016 1019 6:00-6:30 PM 611 6:30-7:00 PM 2:30-3:00 AM 1039 1040 10:30-11:00 AM 1039 1059 6:30-7:00 PM 3:00-3:30 AM 307 308 11:00-11:30 AM 13 114 7:00-7:30 PM 3:30-4:00 AM 719 1140 11:30-12:00 AM 538 539 7:30-8:00 PM 555 4:00-4:30 AM 408 409 12:00-12:30 PM 815 8:00-8:30 PM 20-1 2032 4:30-5:00 AM 419 445 12:30- 1:00 PM 8:30- 9:00 PM 2031 2033 5:00 -5:30 AM 508 529 1:00-1:30 PM 9:00-9:30 PM 211 211 5:30-6:00 AM 519 540 1:30-2:00 PM 9:30-10:00 PM 2135 2135 6:00-6:30 AM 609 610 2:00-2:30 PM 10:00-10:30 PM 01 6:30-7:00 AM 638 639 2:30-3:00 PM 10:30-11:00 PM 222 224 7:00-7:30 AM 708 709 3:00-3:30 PM 216 11:00-11:30 PM 7:30-8:00 AM 719 750 3:30-4:00 PM 338 339 11:30-12:00 PM 332 332 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
Various times and signatures throughout the table

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten times and signatures in a table format. Some information is redacted with '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'.
